ygData.subject: Re: Vampiric Curse
ygData.msgSnippet: Are you certain?  My spell icon for it is blue...that usually meant area effect with other spells... ... From: Murphy, Kenneth E.  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Are you certain? My spell icon for it is blue...that usually meant area
effect with other spells...

----- Original Message -----
From: Murphy, Kenneth E. <MurphyK@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, July 27, 1999 3:14 PM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Vampiric Curse


> From: "Murphy, Kenneth E." <MurphyK@...>
>
> >From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>
>
> >I got Vampiric Curse last night (yay!) It cost me 40 plat for the words
but
> >after 2 weeks of searching I finally have it, one question though. Is
the
> >AoE centered around me? Or my target?
>
> Hello.
>
> Vampiric Curse only effects the direct target of the spell.
>
> Sincerely,
>
> Mortifer
